item.title: Implementing Dark Mode With Checkboxes
item.description: I’m, very unfortunately, always been a light mode person. I like the cleanliness of it. But I’ve recently developed a fascination with dark mode. It’s a feature which has been getting progressively more accepted into the internet development community. The following products went low light in the last couple years: apple, facebook, youtube, instagram, twitter, gmail, slack, soundcloud, google chrome. Here’s a convenient exhaustive list. It’s settled: the future is dark.
